verses.roman:
yugāvatāra ebe śuna, sanātana
satya-tretā-dvāpara-kali-yugera gaṇana

synonyms: yuga-avatāra—incarnation of millenniums; ebe—now; śuna—hear; sanātana—O Sanātana Gosvāmī; satya-tretā-dvāpara-kali-yugera—of the Satya-yuga, Tretā-yuga, Dvāpara-yuga and Kali-yuga; gaṇana—the chronological order.
translation: "O Sanātana, now hear from Me about the yuga-avatāras, the incarnations for the millenniums. First of all, there are four yugas-Satya-yuga, Tretā-yuga, Dvāpara-yuga and Kali-yuga.
